venue.address_2: about two miles east of Lowe's Store
venue.name: Appalachia Trailhead parking lot

item.description:
We will be hiking Mount Jefferson, Adams and Madison. Please read description below. No dogs, cell phones or children are allowed.

All hikers are responsible for reading, understanding and agreeing to the Hikers responsibility code and waiver on this site.

We will be leaving several cars to at Appalachia and driving to the Caps Ridge Traihead. Please note that the road to the Caps Ridge Traihead is a dirt road.

Total distance is 9.86 mi 9 hr 29 min

We will be going up Caps Ridge Traihead to Mount Jefferson, across the ridge to Mount Adams over to Mount Madison and down the Valley Way Trail to the Appalachia parking lot.
item.name: MOUNTS JEFFERSON, ADAMS AND MADISON
